text.0: indra for our assistance bring that most effectual power of thine.
text.1: which conquers men for us and wins the spoil invincible in fight.
text.2: indra whatever aids be thine four be they or o hero three.
text.3: or those of the five tribes of men bring quickly all that help to us.
text.4: the aid most excellent of thee the mightiest hitherward we call.
text.5: for thou wast born with hero might conquering indra with the strong.
text.6: mighty to prosper us wast thou born and mighty is the strength thou hast.
text.7: in native power thy soul is firm thy valour indra slays a host.
text.8: o Śatakratu lord of strength o indra caster of the stone.
text.9: with all thy chariots force assail the man who shows himself thy foe.
text.10: for mightiest vṛtraslayer thee fierce foremost among many folk.
text.11: whose sacred grass is trimmed invite to battle where the spoil is won.
text.12: indra do thou protect our car that mingles foremost in the fights.
text.13: that bears its part in every fray invincible and seeking spoil.
text.14: come to us indra and protect our car with thine intelligence.
text.15: may we o mightiest one obtain excellent fame at break of day and meditate our hymn at dawn.
